attributes.action: create equality between the sexes with males and females having the same retirement age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The life expectancy for women is consistently higher then for men in the UK. 

Yet the retirement age for women is 60 and for men 65.  

We feel this needs to be redressed, and as such raise the female retirement age to 65, inline with males.
